title: Sony begins rolling out Android 12 for Xperia 1 II and Xperia Pro-I
content:
Sony has now started rolling out Android 12 to 2019’s Xperia 1 II and the current flagship Xperia Pro-I having previously updated the Xperia 1 III and Xperia 5 III late last month.

more…

The post Sony begins rolling out Android 12 for Xperia 1 II and Xperia Pro-I appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Sony has now started rolling out Android 12 to 2019's Xperia 1 II and the current flagship Xperia Pro-I smartphones in the United States.
